mapper.insert: insert into `index`(id, icf, ecf, muscle, protein, ffweight, perfat, brate) values (#{id}, #{icf}, #{ecf}, #{muscle}, #{protein}, #{ffweight}, #{perfat}, #{brate})
mapper.update: update `index` set icf = #{icf}, ecf = #{ecf}, muscle = #{muscle}, protein = #{protein}, ffweight = #{ffweight}, perfat = #{perfat}, brate = #{brate} where id = #{id}
